Garland.L Streets, Dallas: The L Streets is a neighborhood in the Lake Highlands area of Dallas, Texas (USA). It is generally bounded by Ferndale Road on the west, Northwest Highway (Loop 12) on the south, Plano Road on the east and Kingsley/Walnut Hill on the north. However, it excludes commercial property on its southwest and southeast corners, apartments along Northwest Highway and a church on its northeast corner.
